name: 1 Sheep, 2 Sheep
description:
R0B07 is trying to have a good night's rest but virus is trying to infiltrate in his body. Good for R0B07, he has Debility Remover & Emulated Anti-Malware aka D.R.E.A.M. installed.
Now it's up to Sleep Helper & Evil Eradication Program aka S.H.E.E.P. to clear out the virus while giving R0B07 a good sleep.

Controls:
W/Up/I button to Jump
Left Mouse Click/Space to Shoot

Game made for Trijam #78
Theme: Robots also dream

Time Taken (According to my timer)
Sprites: 1 hour 8 minutes
Programming: 1 Hour 35 minutes
Bug Fixing: 14 minutes

Total Time: 2 hours 57 Minutes

Sprites made by me
Sound effects taken from freesound.org
